concept.title: 215.403-3 Requiring data other than certified cost or pricing data.

conbody.p: Follow the procedures at PGI PGI 215.403-3 .
(c) Commercial items. For determinations of price reasonableness of major weapon systems acquired as commercial items, see 234.7002(d)
